document.discussion_title: Are you a bad neighbour? | The Maitland Mercury
document.topic_text: Parking in your neighbour's space, especially in apartment blocks Picture: Getty Images. The Law Society of NSW says that when you have a dispute with your neighbour, don’t rush straight for the courts; instead try talking to your neighbour first. Perhaps if you take the view that you’re going to be neighbours for a while, you’ll make a new friend. Nabo is a joint venture with Fairfax Media, publisher of this website. Latest News
